title: The Unlawful Possession of Property Act
title_en: The Unlawful Possession of Property Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Authorized Persons (Rates
of Pay) Regulations, 1954.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In these Regulations-
       "day" means the period between twelve o'clock midnight of one
           day and twelve o'clock midnight of the next succeeding day;
       "duty" includes the attendance at any court for the purpose of
           giving evidence on behalf of the prosecution in connection
            with any offence against the Act.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3. Every authorized person shall be remunerated in respect of the
performance of any duty under the Act at the rate of eighty cents for
each day upon which he performs any such duty.

provisions.title: Section 4
provisions.content:
4. Every authorized person attending any court within his own parish
shall receive a travelling allowance of two cents per mile one way
except when provided with transport at Government expense.
